titleStmt.title: A vindication of publick artificiall baths & bath-stoves from the objections and scandalls obtruded on them, by those that do not, or will not, know their great benefit to the publick, by way of answer to som fellowes of our Colledge of Physitians in London, and others / by Peter Chamberlen, docter in physick and fellow of the said colledge.
titleStmt.author: Chamberlen, Peter, 1601-1683.
